mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.stockAudit.impl.selectStockAuditList] 20190905 - KR JAEMAJEM */ SELECT B.STOCK_AUDIT_NO AS STOCK_AUDIT_NO , B.WH_LOC_ID AS WH_LOC_ID , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DOC_START_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DOC_START_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DOC_END_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DOC_END_DT , B.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID AS LOC_STUS_CODE_ID , CASE WHEN B.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID IN (5685, 5689, 5691, 5713) THEN '01'--Count-Stock Audit ELSE '02'--Count-Stock Detail END AS LOC_STUS_CODE_ID_GU , C.CODE_NAME AS LOC_STUS_CODE_ID_NM , A.ITM_TYPE AS ITM_TYPE , A.ITM_TYPE_NM AS ITM_TYPE_NM FROM LOG0094M A --Stock Audit Doc Master Table INNER JOIN LOG0095M B --Stock Audit LOC Master Table ON A.STOCK_AUDIT_NO = B.STOCK_AUDIT_NO INNER JOIN SYS0013M C ON C.CODE_MASTER_ID = 437 AND C.CODE_ID = B.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' --Use YN AND A.DOC_STUS_CODE_ID <> 5678 --Doc Status ID : 5678(Save) AND ( A.DOC_START_DT BETWEEN #{docStartDt} AND A.DOC_END_DT OR A.DOC_END_DT BETWEEN A.DOC_START_DT AND #{docEndDt} ) AND B.WH_LOC_ID = ( SELECT WH_LOC_ID FROM SYS0028M WHERE WH_LOC_CODE = #{regId} ) ORDER BY A.STOCK_AUDIT_NO DESC

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.stockAudit.impl.selectStockAuditDetail] 20190905 - KR JAEMAJEM */ SELECT B.STOCK_AUDIT_NO AS STOCK_AUDIT_NO , B.WH_LOC_ID AS WH_LOC_ID , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DOC_START_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DOC_START_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DOC_END_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DOC_END_DT , A.DOC_STUS_CODE_ID AS DOC_STUS_CODE_ID , A.REUPLOAD_YN AS REUPLOAD_YN , APPV_3_REQST.USER_NAME AS APPV_3_REQST_USER_ID , TO_CHAR(A.APPV_3_REQST_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS APPV_3_REQST_DT , A.APPV_3_REQST_OPINION AS APPV_3_REQST_OPINION , A.APPV_ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID AS APPV_ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID , APPV_3.USER_NAME AS APPV_3_USER_ID , TO_CHAR(A.APPV_3_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS APPV_3_DT , A.APPV_3_OPINION AS APPV_3_OPINION , A.STOCK_AUDIT_REASON AS STOCK_AUDIT_REASON , A.LOC_TYPE AS LOC_TYPE , A.LOC_TYPE_NM AS LOC_TYPE_NM , A.LOC_STK_GRAD AS LOC_STK_GRAD , A.CTGRY_TYPE AS CTGRY_TYPE , A.CTGRY_TYPE_NM AS CTGRY_TYPE_NM , A.ITM_TYPE AS ITM_TYPE , A.ITM_TYPE_NM AS ITM_TYPE_NM , A.REM AS REM , A.USE_YN AS USE_YN , APPV_1_REQST.USER_NAME AS APPV_1_REQST_USER_ID , TO_CHAR(B.APPV_1_REQST_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS APPV_1_REQST_DT , APPV_1.USER_NAME AS APPV_1_USER_ID , TO_CHAR(B.APPV_1_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS APPV_1_DT , B.APPV_1_OPINION AS APPV_1_OPINION , APPV_2.USER_NAME AS APPV_2_USER_ID , TO_CHAR(B.APPV_2_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS APPV_2_DT , B.APPV_2_OPINION AS APPV_2_OPINION , B.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID AS LOC_STUS_CODE_ID , C.CODE_NAME AS DOC_STUS_CODE_ID_NM , CASE WHEN B.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID IN (5685, 5689, 5691, 5713) THEN '01'--Count-Stock Audit ELSE '02'--Count-Stock Detail END AS LOC_STUS_CODE_ID_GU , NVL(A.SERIAL_CHK_YN, 'N') AS SERIAL_CHK_YN , #{viewGu} AS VIEW_GU FROM LOG0094M A --Stock Audit Doc Master Table INNER JOIN LOG0095M B --Stock Audit LOC Master Table ON A.STOCK_AUDIT_NO = B.STOCK_AUDIT_NO INNER JOIN SYS0013M C ON C.CODE_MASTER_ID = 437 AND C.CODE_ID = B.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M APPV_1_REQST ON APPV_1_REQST.USER_ID = B.APPV_1_REQST_USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M APPV_1 ON APPV_1.USER_ID = B.APPV_1_USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M APPV_2 ON APPV_2.USER_ID = B.APPV_2_USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M APPV_3_REQST ON APPV_3_REQST.USER_ID = A.APPV_3_REQST_USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M APPV_3 ON APPV_3.USER_ID = A.APPV_3_USER_ID WHERE B.STOCK_AUDIT_NO = #{stockAuditNo} AND B.WH_LOC_ID = #{whLocId}

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.stockAudit.impl.selectStockAuditDetailList] 20191029 - KR JAEMAJEM */ SELECT B.STOCK_AUDIT_NO AS STOCK_AUDIT_NO , B.WH_LOC_ID AS WH_LOC_ID , C.ITM_ID AS ITM_ID , D.STK_CODE AS STK_CODE , D.STK_DESC AS ITM_ID_NM , D.STK_TYPE_ID AS STK_TYPE_ID , E.CODE_NAME AS STK_TYPE_ID_NM , NVL(C.CNT_QTY, 0) AS CNT_QTY , NVL(C.SYS_QTY, 0) AS SYS_QTY , NVL(C.DIFF_QTY, 0) AS DIFF_QTY , C.REM AS REM , B.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID AS LOC_STUS_CODE_ID , CASE WHEN B.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID IN (5685, 5689, 5691, 5713) THEN '01'--Count-Stock Audit ELSE '02'--Count-Stock Detail END AS LOC_STUS_CODE_ID_GU , NVL(A.SERIAL_CHK_YN, 'N') AS SERIAL_CHK_YN , NVL(D.SERIAL_CHK, 'N') AS SERIAL_CHK FROM LOG0094M A --Stock Audit Doc Master Table INNER JOIN LOG0095M B --Stock Audit LOC Master Table ON B.STOCK_AUDIT_NO = A.STOCK_AUDIT_NO INNER JOIN LOG0096D C --Stock Audit LOC Detail Table ON C.STOCK_AUDIT_NO = B.STOCK_AUDIT_NO AND C.WH_LOC_ID = B.WH_LOC_ID INNER JOIN SYS0026M D ON D.STK_ID = C.ITM_ID INNER JOIN SYS0013M E ON E.CODE_MASTER_ID = 15 AND E.CODE_ID = D.STK_TYPE_ID WHERE B.STOCK_AUDIT_NO = #{stockAuditNo} AND B.WH_LOC_ID = #{whLocId} ORDER BY B.STOCK_AUDIT_NO DESC
mapper.update: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.stockAudit.impl.updateAppv3LOG0094M] 20200106 - KR JAEMAJEM */ UPDATE LOG0094M SET APPV_3_REQST_USER_ID = NULL , APPV_3_REQST_DT = NULL , APPV_3_REQST_OPINION = NULL , APPV_3_USER_ID= NULL , APPV_3_DT= NULL , APPV_3_OPINION= NULL , DOC_STUS_CODE_ID = '5679' --5679(Start Audit) , UPD_USER_ID = #{updUserId} , UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE STOCK_AUDIT_NO = #{stockAuditNo}

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.stockAudit.impl.updateSaveLocStusCodeIdLOG0095M] 20191030 - KR JAEMAJEM */ UPDATE LOG0095M A --Stock Audit LOC Master Table SET A.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID = 5686 --Location Status ID (SYS0013M - CODE_MASTER_ID : 437)--Save , APPV_1_REQST_USER_ID = NULL , APPV_1_REQST_DT = NULL , APPV_1_USER_ID = NULL , APPV_1_DT = NULL , APPV_1_OPINION = NULL , APPV_2_USER_ID = NULL , APPV_2_DT= NULL , APPV_2_OPINION = NULL , A.UPD_USER_ID = #{updUserId} --Update User , A.UPD_DT = SYSDATE --Update date WHERE A.STOCK_AUDIT_NO = #{stockAuditNo} --Stock Audit Number AND A.WH_LOC_ID = #{whLocId} --WHLocID AND A.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID IN (5685, 5686, 5689, 5691, 5713) --5685(Unregistered), 5686(Save), 5689(1st Reject), 5691(2nd Reject), 5713(3rd Reject)

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.stockAudit.impl.updateSaveLocStusCodeIdLOG0096D] 20191030 - KR JAEMAJEM */ UPDATE LOG0096D A --Stock Audit LOC Detail Table SET A.CNT_QTY = #{cntQty} --Count Qty , A.DIFF_QTY = #{diffQty} --Diff Qty , A.OTHER_QTY = #{otherQty} --Other GI/GR Qty , A.REM = #{rem} --Remark , A.DED_REASON = NULL , A.OTHER_REASON = NULL , A.UPD_USER_ID = #{updUserId} --Update User , A.UPD_DT = SYSDATE --Update date WHERE A.STOCK_AUDIT_NO = #{stockAuditNo} --Stock Audit Number AND A.WH_LOC_ID = #{whLocId} --WHLocID AND A.ITM_ID = #{itmId} --Item ID

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.stockAudit.impl.updateSaveLocStusCodeIdBarcodeLOG0096D] 20200102 - KR JAEMAJEM */ UPDATE LOG0096D A --Stock Audit LOC Detail Table SET A.REM = #{rem} --Remark , A.DED_REASON = NULL , A.OTHER_REASON = NULL , A.UPD_USER_ID = #{updUserId} --Update User , A.UPD_DT = SYSDATE --Update date WHERE A.STOCK_AUDIT_NO = #{stockAuditNo} --Stock Audit Number AND A.WH_LOC_ID = #{whLocId} --WHLocID AND A.ITM_ID = #{itmId} --Item ID

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.stockAudit.impl.updateRequestApproval] 20191030 - KR JAEMAJEM */ UPDATE LOG0095M A --Stock Audit LOC Master Table SET A.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID = 5687 --Location Status ID (SYS0013M - CODE_MASTER_ID : 437)--Request approval , APPV_1_REQST_USER_ID = #{updUserId} , APPV_1_REQST_DT = SYSDATE , A.UPD_USER_ID = #{updUserId} --Update User , A.UPD_DT = SYSDATE --Update date WHERE A.STOCK_AUDIT_NO = #{stockAuditNo} --Stock Audit Number AND A.WH_LOC_ID = #{whLocId} --WHLocID AND A.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID = 5686 --Location Status ID (SYS0013M - CODE_MASTER_ID : 437)--Save
